hasAttributes.name: WorkOrderId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Work Order

hasAttributes.name: ContractId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

hasAttributes.name: VendorId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Vendor.

hasAttributes.name: RepairNote
hasAttributes.description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding Extraordinary Repairs.

hasAttributes.name: RepairActualCost
hasAttributes.description: The actual cost of the Repair.

hasAttributes.name: RepairEstimatedCost
hasAttributes.description: The estimated cost of the Repair.

hasAttributes.name: RepairCompletedTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The timestamp that the Repair was completed.

hasAttributes.name: RepairStartedTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The timestamp that Repair actually was started.

hasAttributes.name: RepairPlannedTimestamp
hasAttributes.description: The timestamp that the Repair was planned to start.

hasAttributes.name: ExtraordinaryRepairTypeId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of an Extraordinary Repairs Type.

hasAttributes.name: ExtraordinaryRepairTypeName
hasAttributes.description: The name of an Extraordinary Repairs Type.

hasAttributes.name: ExtraordinaryRepairTypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: The description of an Extraordinary Repairs Type.

definitions.description:
A classification or categorization of types of Extraordinary Repairs based upon common characteristics or functions performed.

This would be dependent upon the type of Asset.

Ex:
- Upgrade
- Overhaul
- Value Retrofit
